com.ipt.ebsa.agnostic.client.skyscape.module

Class RestCallUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ipt.ebsa.agnostic.client.skyscape.module.RestCallUtil

  • public class RestCallUtil
extends Object
    Generic logic for handling retry and waiting for REST calls made direct to Skyscape from VCloudEntities. Current implementation is to have a separate method for each type of VCloudEntity call, as making the method generic introduces a lot of unnecessary complexity in terms of type conversion, method determination etc. This can be revised in the future if required. (If all the VCloudEntity.getByReference() methods has the same signature, then all would be gravy...)

    • Method Detail

      • processVAppRestCall

        public com.vmware.vcloud.sdk.Vapp processVAppRestCall(com.vmware.vcloud.sdk.VcloudClient vCloudClient,
                                             com.vmware.vcloud.api.rest.schema.ReferenceType ref)
                                               throws com.vmware.vcloud.sdk.VCloudException
        Method to process VApp Rest calls to getVappByReference(). If we get an exception from the call it is often down to a temporary issue either connecting to, or an internal processing issue with, Skyscape. If we retry 3 times to no avail, we throw the exception back to the caller to handle appropriately.
        Parameters:
        vCloudClient -
        ref -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        com.vmware.vcloud.sdk.VCloudException

private com.vmware.vcloud.sdk.VcloudEntity<? extends com.vmware.vcloud.api.rest.schema.EntityType> prototypeProcessGenericRestCall(com.vmware.vcloud.sdk.VcloudClient vCloudClient,

                                                                                                                                    String methodName)
                                                                                                                            throws com.vmware.vcloud.sdk.VCloudException
        Deprecated. 
        Prototype untested method to process generic ByReference VCloud Client Rest calls. If we get an exception from the call it is often down to a temporary issue either connecting to, or an internal processing issue with, Skyscape. If we retry 3 times to no avail, we throw the exception back to the caller to handle appropriately.
        Parameters:
        vCloudClient -
        ref -
        entity - Class of our generic VCloudEntity with wild-carded EntityType
        methodName -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        com.vmware.vcloud.sdk.VCloudException
